comments.body: Nitpick: keep a single empty newline, as above

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +90,94 @@   a [git-machete package](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/git-machete) is hosted in Arch User Repository (AUR).
   If the release introduces significant changes/critical bugfixes, please [flag the package as out of date](https://aur.archlinux.org/pkgbase/git-machete/flag).

1. Verify if changes you made in [blog-1.md](https://github.com/VirtusLab/git-machete/blob/copy-docs/docs/blog-1/blog-1.md) and [blog-2.md](https://github.com/VirtusLab/git-machete/blob/copy-docs/docs/blog-2/blog-2.md) are reflected in corresponding medium articles: [Make your way through the git (rebase) jungle with Git Machete](https://medium.com/virtuslab/make-your-way-through-the-git-rebase-jungle-with-git-machete-e2ed4dbacd02) or [Git Machete Strikes again!](https://medium.com/virtuslab/git-machete-strikes-again-traverse-the-git-rebase-jungle-even-faster-with-v2-0-f43ebaf8abb0).
   If not please apply changes also here to keep consistency.

comments.body: Also! `.DS_Store` definitely should **not** be included in the repository. Pls remove + add to .gitignore

comments.body: Note that you'll need to update these links in a subsequent change: they both refer to `copy-docs` branch, which is going to be removed once this PR #145 is merged. They should point to `develop` branch instead once this PR is merged.
No action required on this PR tho
